des.min3halla.drink_mixer_1: An illegally modified B.T.C. drink mixer
des.min3halla.drink_mixer_2: Although the automatic product delivery function is broken, it can add some ritual sense of shaking
des.min3halla.beer: "Traditionally brewed beer has become a luxury, but this one's pretty close to the real deal..."
des.min3halla.bleeding_jane: "Say the name of this drink three times in front of a mirror and you'll look like a fool."
des.min3halla.blue_fairy: "One of these will make all your teeth turn blue. Hope you brushed them well."
des.min3halla.brandtini: "8 out of 10 smug assholes would recommend it but they're too busy being smug assholes."
des.min3halla.cobalt_velvet: "It's like champaigne served on a cup that had a bit of cola left."
des.min3halla.crevice_spike: "It will knock the drunkenness out of you or knock you out cold."
des.min3halla.fluffy_dream: "A couple of these will make your tongue feel velvet-y. More of them and you'll be sleeping soundly."
des.min3halla.fringe_weaver: "It's like drinking ethylic alcohol with a spoonful of sugar."
des.min3halla.grizzly_temple: "This one's kinda unbearable. It's mostly for fans of the movie it was used on."
des.min3halla.gut_punch: "It's supposed to mean 'a punch made of innards', but the name actually described what you feel while drinking it."
des.min3halla.marsblast: "One of these is enough to leave your face red like the actual planet."
des.min3halla.mercuryblast: "No thermometer was harmed in the creation of this drink."
des.min3halla.moonblast: "No relation to the Hadron cannon you can see on the moon for one week every month."
des.min3halla.piano_man: "This drink does not represent the opinions of the Bar Pianists Union or its associates."
des.min3halla.piano_woman: "It was originally called Pretty Woman, but too many people complained there should be a Piano Woman if there was a Piano Man."
des.min3halla.pile_driver: "It doesn't burn as hard on the tongue but you better not have a sore throat when drinking it..."
des.min3halla.sparkle_star: "They used to actually sparkle, but too many complaints about skin problem made them redesign the drink without sparkling."
des.min3halla.sugar_rush: "Sweet, light and fruity. As girly as it gets."
des.min3halla.sunshine_cloud: "Tastes like old chocolate milk with its good smell intact. Some say it tastes like caramel too..."
des.min3halla.suplex: "A small twist on the Piledriver, putting more emphasis on the tongue burning and less on the throat burning."
des.min3halla.zen_star: "You'd think something so balanced would actually taste nice... you'd be dead wrong."
des.min3halla.mulan_tea: "A coveted tea-based liquor. Tastes like green tea and kicks like whiskey."
des.min3halla.absinthe: A bottle of Absinthe Jill brought to VA-11 Hall-A from her home
des.min3halla.superb_basketball: "It should have been called 'Super Basketball', but it's actually superb."
item.min3halla.septwolves: Sent My Daughter Home By This Time OR I'll Tie You To A Street Lamp AND Whip You With An Iron Whip
item.min3halla.alarm_lamp: You'll Be Chased By A Car With This Color Of Light If You Drink This Before Driving
des.min3halla.alarm_lamp: "Don't drink before drive, don't drive after drinking. Price 60.12 represents 12 points for six months." ——@Jihe Bistro
item.min3halla.afterglow: You Should Be Happy To Get Off Work In This Color Of Sunset
des.min3halla.afterglow: "There are cocktails with normal names, but you just never noticed them." ——@Jihe Bistro
des.min3halla.fried_rice: "A customer came to the bar and ordered a bowl of fried rice..."
advancement.min3halla.drink_mixer.des: "Time to mix drinks and change lives"
advancement.min3halla.shaker_pot: "Time to mix lives and change... drinks?"
advancement.min3halla.shaker_pot.des: Make a drink with a shaker pot
advancement.min3halla.collector.des: Collect all four bottled drinks from VA-11 Hall-A
advancement.min3halla.cyber_commelier.de: 品尝来自VA-11 Hall-A的在售饮品
